rocksmash.message: ❌ You need the Steel Badge to use Rock Smash!

fly.message: ❌ You need a special item to use Fly!

cut.message: ❌ You need a knife or machete to use Cut!

strength.message: ❌ You need a heavy item to use Strength!

flash.message: ❌ You need a Flash Item to use Flash!

teleport.message: ❌ You need a Teleport Item to use Teleport!

rockclimb.message: ❌ You need climbing gear to use Rock Climb!

ultrahole.message: ❌ You need Ultrabeast to summon a Ultra Hole!
